subclassFeature.name: Tool Proficiency
entries: When you adopt this specialization at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with carpenter's tools. If you already have this proficiency, you gain proficiency with one other type of artisan's tools of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: War Weaver Spells
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the War Weaver Spells table. These spells count as artificer spells for you, but they don't count against the number of artificer spells you prepare.

subclassFeature.name: Docent
entries: When you reach 3rd level, you learn the Homunculus Servant infusion. If you already know the infusion, you can replace it with a new infusion of your choice.
You can use your Homunculus Servant Infusion to make a Docent instead. You can only have 1 active Docent at time.

subclassFeature.name: Knowledge Network
entries: You imbue some of your life force into the Docent awakening ancient knowledge believed lost to the time. Starting at 3rd level you know how to manipulate and tap into the information stored in your Docent.
You can tap into such knowledge only a limited time per day as shown in the Knowledge Tap Table below

The type of knowledge stored in the Docent can be manipulated through the installation of Modules. Each time you take a Long Rest choose a Module to install on your Docent from the Modules Table. Once installed, you gain the Bonus and the Ability associated with it.

subclassFeature.name: Deeper Knowledge
entries: You learned to estabilish a better link with your Docent. Starting from 5th level when taking a Long Rest you can choose to install 2 modules instead of one. You gain both abilities provided by the modules but can only choose one Bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Improved Link
entries: You became more accustomed using your link with the Docent. Starting from 9th level, you can gain back one of your daily knowledge tap.

subclassFeature.name: Empowered Network
entries: Starting at 15th level, once per long rest you can install an additional module, for a total of 3 module, gaining all the abilities provided but can only choose one Bonus among them. You can gain back up to 2 knowledge tap instead of one from your Improved Link feature.
